name: WheelTris
description:
WheelTris defines a new genre of casual games. Its is inspired by charming clockwork apparatuses such as clocks, automatons and other steampunk masterpieces. The game provides unique experience you have never seen before. It combines vivid and mesmerizing visuals, addictive gameplay and easy controls.

Draw lines of wheels. Collect bonuses. Deal with obstacles and dangers. Meet puzzles. And much more

Try it now. Get your brain in gear!
